snippet: Two acclaimed writers discuss everything from getting off the interstate and slowing down to the importance of recording your trips.
abstract: Journalist Philip Caputo, author of travel book The Longest Road: Overland in Search of America, From Key West to the Arctic Ocean, discusses appeal of the American road with travel writer William Least Heat-Moon, whose latest book is Here, There, Elsewhere: Stories From the Road.
lead_paragraph: Two acclaimed writers discuss everything from getting off the interstate and slowing down to the importance of recording your trips.

headline.seo: A Conversation Between Philip Caputo and William Least Heat-Moon
headline.main: To See America, Be a Traveler, Not a Tourist
headline.print_headline: To See America, Be a Traveler, Not a Tourist
